name: 24/7 Media

It identifies, quantifies, and optimizes high-value target audiences, which can then be offered to advertisers via an integrated, secure, privacy-friendly management system that works across all advertising distribution platforms.

name: Adap.TV

Our video intelligence platform, Pathway™, helps many of the world's largest brands, agencies, publishers and ad networks intelligently, effectively and safely plan, buy and measure billions of video ad trades programmatically every month across web, linear TV and mobile video.

name: AdRoll
description: AdRoll is a full-service display platform that provides retargeting, analytics, optimization, and enterprise solutions for advertisers.

name: AOL
description: AOL Advertising provides advertisers, agencies, and publishers with comprehensive and efficient online advertising tools.

name: AppNexus
description: AppNexus provides an open and customizable advertising technology platform to serve buyers and sellers of online advertising

name: Arcametrics
description: Arcametrics provides custom lookalike and branded category audiences to online advertisers, advertising agencies, and lead gen companies. We enable advertisers to improve display and video campaign performance by targeting highly optimized prospect audiences that mirror existing customers or converters.

name: Oracle Data Cloud (BlueKai)

name: Brand.net
description: Brand.net,a Valassis Digital company, is a leading ad network that uses precise targeting technology to deliver probability over possibility and action over exposure.

name: BrightRoll
description: BrightRoll offers innovative video advertising solutions – including proprietary ad serving and optimization, advanced audience targeting, standard-setting ad units and transparent reporting – to reach audiences across web, mobile and connected TV

name: Chango
description: Chango is a technology media company in the field of data-driven and programmatic digital advertising, specializing in search retargeting and programmatic marketing.

name: Visto
description: Visto is a technology company dedicated to bringing transparency, interoperability and accountability to digital advertising. The company's Visto™ Enterprise Advertising Hub is a vendor-agnostic platform that unites the complete ad tech stack in a single user-friendly interface. Brands, media companies and agencies benefit from transparency in managing execution partners, optimizing ad spend, measuring performance and leveraging analytics to drive efficiencies and improve ROI. For more information, contact www.vistohub.com.

name: comScore
description: comScore completed its merger with Rentrak Corporation in January 2016, to create the new model for a dynamic, cross-platform world. Built on precision and innovation, our unmatched data footprint combines proprietary digital, TV and movie intelligence with vast demographic details to quantify consumers’ multiscreen behavior at massive scale. This approach helps media companies monetize their complete audiences and allows marketers to reach these audiences more effectively. With more than 3,200 clients and global footprint in more than 75 countries, comScore is delivering the future of measurement. For more information on comScore, please visit comscore.com.

name: Connexity
description: Connexity (formerly Shopzilla) is a data driven marketing solutions company with 15+ years of e-commerce and media experience.  The company operates one of the world’s largest retail marketplaces, with over 325MM product listings indexed and published for online shopping across the globe.  Leveraging its premium online retail network, proprietary technology, and advanced audience modeling, Connexity helps brands and retailers find and target the right audiences on any device.

name: Convertro
description: Convertro provides leading brands and agencies with a marketing optimization platform and results engine that tracks and calculates the ROI of every marketing touchpoint across all media, including online, broadcast television, radio, call center, print, direct mail, and more.

name: Core Audience
description: Core Audience is a software as a service (SaaS) company that powers audience-based marketing across bought, earned and owned media.

name: Datalab Digital
description: DataLab USA is an award winning database marketing company that focuses on optimizing multichannel marketing solutions. Through the use of analytics, data sourcing, data processing, and digital services DataLab USA effectively enables organizations to maximize their direct marketing investments.

name: DataXu
description: The DataXu platform enables marketers to understand and engage customers in the digital space through optimization of marketing investments across all channels.

name: Sizmek
description: Sizmek is a leading ad management and distribution platform, is uniquely positioned to help our customers win through powerful technology, stellar services and the delivery of innovative and effective multiscreen advertising.

name: Digilant
description: Digilant strives to help brands execute better advertising through good customer insight tools.

name: DoubleClick Licensing (Data Store Only / Google DDP)
description: DoubleClick Bid Manager is a next-generation demand-side platform (DSP) from Google. Built on Google’s global infrastructure and fully integrated in DoubleClick Digital Marketing, DoubleClick Bid Manager re-imagines programmatic buying to enable agencies and marketers to buy display media more effectively and efficiently from a single platform across exchanges in real time.

name: Dstillery
description: Dstillery develops targeting technology that finds prospects most likely to engage with a given brand and shows ads only to those customers

name: Ensighten
description: Ensighten leads the industry in Real-Time™ Tag Management solutions for the enterprise. Marketers can easily deploy third-party tags, without Javascript programming. Ensighten accelerates website performance, increases marketing agility, precision, and effectiveness, and ensures privacy compliance.

name: Nielsen Marketing Cloud
description: A DMP bought by Nielsen that powers digital marketing decisions for marketers, agencies, platforms, publishers, and data providers.

name: Exponential / Tribal Fusion
description:
For more than 15 years, leading brands from around the world and their agencies have turned to Exponential to generate exceptional result-oriented advertising campaigns across display, video and mobile.
 
The Exponential – LiveRamp integration enables advertisers to transfer their own audience data stored within the Adobe Audience Manager to Exponential to generate exceptional result-oriented campaigns and meaningful experiences across display, video and mobile.
 
Exponential’s data management technology will layer your first party data with exclusive interest-based audience data to develop rich-user profiles that reveal who your audience is, what they do, where they go, and what they buy.
 
Exponential’s wealth of experience in working with custom segmentation enables advertiser’s to identify relevant users, qualify high-value consumers and amplify reach to new prospects.
 
For more information, please visit www.exponential.com.

name: ForeSee
description: ForeSee is a customer experience analytics company that uses a trusted technology and the proven ForeSee® CXA℠ methodology to measure satisfaction and deliver insights that help companies achieve maximum business impact.

name: AdWords Google Display Network

name: Huddled Masses
description: Huddled Masses offers organizations and agencies access to media buying technology and expertise.

name: Salesforce DMP (Krux)
description: Salesforce DMP helps more than 200 leading marketers and media companies deliver more relevant, thus more valuable, consumer experiences by capturing, unifying, and activating data signatures across every device (desktop, mobile, tablet, set-top) and every channel (display, social, search, video), in real time.

name: Lotame
description: Lotame is the universal cross-device data management platform that is humanizing the consumer decision journey by empowering enterprises to deliver more relevant content, products, and services. Lotame unifies and enriches the world’s data to create more meaningful relationships and increase commerce and brand loyalty.

name: Marin Software
description: Marin Software provides a leading Revenue Acquisition Management platform used by advertisers and agencies to manage more than $5 billion in annualized ad spend. Offering an integrated platform for search, display, social, and mobile marketing, Marin helps advertisers and brands improve financial performance, save time, and make better decisions.

name: Martini Media
description: Martini Media is the digital media and content platform for engaging the audience with the most money and influence online. With more than 1,000 publishers organized across multiple lifestyle and business verticals, Martini Media has helped the world’s leading brands reach over 125 million consumers across the globe that invest in their passions at work and play.

name: MediaMath
description: MediaMath's TerminalOne Marketing Operating System allows agencies and advertisers to plan, execute, optimize, and analyze marketing programs across the digital landscape.

name: Merkle
description: Merkle is the largest privately-held customer relationship marketing agency in the U.S. For more than 25 years, Fortune 1,000 companies and leading non-profit organizations have partnered with Merkle to build and maximize the value of their customer portfolios and return on their marketing investments.

name: MOAT
description: Moat Analytics is a proprietary solution for advertisers and publishers to measure ad effectiveness and content engagement that exposes a new lens of attention measures that move beyond traditional digital metrics.

name: myThings
description: myThings is a global leader in conversion-driven, personalized display advertising solutions, driving incremental sales at scale for top online retailers. The company delivers performance through specialized data-driven display technology centered on conversion prediction machine-learning algorithms.

name: pulsepoint
description: PulsePoint is a digital media and advertising technology company offering integrated tools and insights that help marketers and publishers engage and grow their audience.

name: RhythmOne
description: RhythmOne provides streamlined, transparent connections between advertisers and audiences through a combination of differentiated supply, innovative technology and data-driven insights. Our end-to-end platform provides more direct, efficient and effective connections, driving ROI for advertisers and publishers.

name: Rakuten
description: Rakuten's ad platform serves up personalized shopping experiences and allows marketers the ability to measure consumer engagement and site conversions.

name: Resonate Networks

Resonate HI-RES leverages its proprietary data on consumers’ motivations, values, media habits and online behaviors to help organizations learn why consumers decide to take — or not take — certain actions.

name: ReTargeter
description: ReTargeter provides display retargeting solutions to serve ads to the most relevant audiences.

name: Rocket Fuel
description: Rocket Fuel is a leading predictive marketing platform provider, offering clients managed services and SaaS-based DMP and DSP capabilities to optimize performance, awareness, and lift across marketing objectives, channels and devices.

name: Viant
description: Viant is a media platform company that enables brands to connect with consumers across formats and screens.

name: SteelHouse
description: SteelHouse combines a data-driven Advertising Suite and powerful Creative Suite that allows brands, agencies, and e-commerce marketers to build beautiful campaigns that perform in any channel, across every device.

name: Tapad
description: Tapad Inc., is a marketing technology firm renowned for its breakthrough, unified, cross-device advertising solutions. The company offers the largest in-market opportunity for advertisers to address the new and ever-evolving reality of media consumption on smartphones, tablets, home computers and smart TVs.

name: The Trade Desk
description: The Trade Desk is a technology company that empowers buyers of advertising. The Trade Desk provides a self-service platform that enables ad buyers to manage data-driven digital advertising campaigns using their own teams across various advertising formats, including display, video, and social, and on a multitude of devices, including computers, mobile devices, and connected TV.

name: Tremor Video
description: Tremor Video is a leading provider of technology-driven video advertising solutions enabling brand advertisers to engage consumers across multiple internet-connected devices including computers, smartphones, tablets, and connected TVs.

name: Triggit
description: Triggit enables advertisers and agencies to build run, measure, and optimize retargeting-driven display campaigns from a single platform.

name: Adobe Ad Cloud (formerly TubeMogul)
description: TubeMogul is a video marketing company built for branding. By integrating real-time media buying, ad serving, targeting, optimization and brand measurement into its PlayTime platform, TubeMogul simplifies the delivery of video ads and maximizes the impact of every dollar spent by brand marketers.

name: Amobee/Turn
description: Turn delivers software that simplifies data management and executes real-time bidding to improve the performance of advertising initiatives.

name: Twitter
description: Twitter’s tailored audiences product enables advertisers to define their own groups of existing and target customers and connect with them on Twitter. In doing so, the advertiser can reach users who have shown interest in their brand or their category, and drive increase return on marketing investment.

name: V12 Data
description: V12 Data maps offline demographic, lifestyle and purchase data into online audience segments at the individual and household level data for US-based consumers. Our data file includes Automotive, CPG, Movers, Demographics, Lifestyle, Consumer, B2B, Travel, Finance, Political, Ethnicity, Net Worth, Lifestage, and more. All data is sourced from self-reported and transactional data. V12 Data offers 12 distinct audience categories and 1,500+ segments to help clients reach the most relevant online audience for any campaign.

name: Visual IQ
description: Visual IQ is a cross-channel marketing attribution software company with a suite of hosted software products.

name: Videology
description: The Videology® Addressable Audience Platform is a video advertising technology that works across all video screens to connect brands with those consumers they most want to reach.

name: X+1
description: The [x+1] Origin platform offers integrated and open software for data-driven digital marketing.

name: Xaxis
description: Xaxis connects advertisers and audience through audience modeling to drive real attributable results.

name: Yellowhammer Media Group
description: Yellowhammer Media Group is a Demand-Side Platform and Ad Serving Service Provider that delivers display solutions for both brands and agencies.

name: YuMe
description: YuMe is a digital video advertising solution provider that drives brand results and digital media revenue.

name: Experian Marketing Services
description: Experian Marketing Services is a leading global provider of consumer insights, targeting, data quality and cross-channel marketing. Experian helps organizations intelligently interact with today’s empowered and hyperconnected consumers.

name: Equifax
description: IXI Services (an Equifax division) helps the nation’s leading financial services and consumer marketing firms optimize marketing efforts, identify growth markets, and enhance practice and performance management.

name: Drawbridge
description: Drawbridge technology was created to bridge audiences across screens, apps, and devices. Making cross-device advertising perform requires precise audience targeting, accurate conversion tracking and attribution across screens. Drawbridge has built the first effective cross-device matching solution, bridging data from the desktop web to target over 1 billion mobile devices.

name: TransUnion
description: Information is a powerful thing. TransUnion is dedicated to finding innovative ways information can be used to help make better and smarter decisions. We uncover trends and insights using current and historical information as well as alternative data sources. These insights empower our customers to identify and reach their clients and prospects online or offline. Our data helps a variety of businesses to better manage risk and find the right consumers for their services. Today, TransUnion reaches consumers and businesses in more than 30 countries around the world on five continents. Through the power of information, TransUnion is working to build stronger economies and families and safer communities worldwide. We call this Information for Good.

name: AdTheorent
description: AdTheorent’s machine learning technology powers predictive targeting, predictive creative, and self-learning insights. Using custom machine learning models to engage the right consumer with the optimal creative experience, AdTheorent delivers industry-leading performance, award-winning creative, and advanced machine learning optimizations across all digital environments.

name: Google DoubleClick Search
description: Built on Google infrastructure, DoubleClick Search makes it faster and easier to manage large search campaigns across AdWords, Microsoft adCenter and Yahoo Search Marketing. Powerful, easy-to-use workflow and reporting features save you time, while strategic bid optimization features help you improve performance. Native integration with the DoubleClick platform allows you to manage and track all your digital ad buys across one platform, enabling rich, cross- channel reporting and attribution.

name: Adlucent
description: Adlucent is a performance-based retail marketing technology and analytics company focused on helping deliver relevant advertising that converts. A leader in applied shopping analytics, Adlucent leverages its BuyerPath™ platform and a combination of unique data, analytics, and expert services to give you all the right answers.

name: GroundTruth (formerly xAd)
description: GroundTruth is the leading global technology platform driving in-store visits and sales by leveraging location as the primary source of intent. We believe in the power of place. Build your brand, increase sales and grow your business by building off what real people are doing in the real world, mapped using our proprietary Blueprints technology. Through its data foundation, GroundTruth sees 2 out 3 smartphone users in the U.S. and more than 30 billion physical visits annually across 21 countries globally. Learn more: www.groundtruth.com

name: MentAd
description: MentAd helps companies identify who their next customer is and how to acquire them most effectively. Through its predictive marketing platform, MentAd leverages sophisticated big data and machine learning techniques to acquire the right customer via the right channels at the optimal price.

name: Monetate
description: Monetate generates billions of dollars of new revenue for businesses, helping them grow 39% faster than the industry average. Brands such as Best Buy, National Geographic, and Celebrity Cruises rely on Monetate to put the customer first, creating stronger relationships that drive a sustained, competitive advantage.

name: Optimizely
description: Optimizely is the world's leading experience optimization platform that both technical and non-technical users leverage to turn data into action. The company was founded by two former Google product managers, Dan Siroker and Pete Koomen. Dan served as the Director of Analytics during the Obama 2008 presidential campaign. While there, his team relied on the use of A/B and multivariate testing to maximize e-mail sign-ups, volunteers, and donations to raise more than $100 million in additional revenue for the campaign.

name: LiveIntent
description: LiveIntent is a smarter way to market and advertise in email. The LiveIntent platform helps over 900 top brands deliver marketing and advertising messages to over 120MM unique, engaged people each month, in emails sent by over 1100 top US publishers and brands to their loyal subscribers. In 2010, LiveIntent cut its teeth as a smarter way to buy and sell ads in email and has since been recognized in both 2014 and 2015 as the second fastest growing company in NYC (by Crain’s) and as one of America’s Most Promising Companies (Forbes 2015.) With the email address at the center of its platform, LiveIntent has evolved beyond simply putting ads in email. LiveIntent is now one of the largest people-based marketing platforms in the world and also one of the first, having gone to market with the technology in 2010. LiveIntent is headquartered in NYC, with offices in Austin, Copenhagen, Detroit, Berlin, and the UK, serving as home to 209 people and counting.

name: Simpli.fi
description: Simpli.fi is a programmatic marketing platform that uses unstructured data to simplify digital media buying. Our platform uses unstructured data to enable advertisers to bid, optimize and report at the individual data element level across display, mobile, video and social real-time bidding exchanges and programmatic direct.

name: AddThis
description: AddThis data reflects behavioral insights from over 14 million domains worldwide reaching over 1.6 billion unique browsers monthly. Our advanced technology processes more than 300 terabytes of data each day allowing AddThis to provide data partners with fresh, rich and sophisticated audience segments. AddThis data includes content interest and consumer intent signal that spans, site, search and social actions across desktop, mobile and tablet that can be used in a wide range of solutions that help inform targeted marketing strategies.

name: Cross Pixel
description: Cross Pixel is the leading provider of high-performance audience data and information for the real-time advertising industry. Cross Pixel’s mission is to provide the highest quality data to help marketers improve campaign performance. Utilizing Cross Pixel’s proprietary data management technology, audiences are built with granular and transparent control over where users are harvested and how they qualify to be targeted. This approach drives performance while giving advertisers insight, confidence of authenticity and control around the data powering their online advertising campaigns.

name: Pulpo Media
description: Pulpo Media is the only holistic ad network that reaches Hispanics across acculturation levels and digital devices.  Pulpo Media combines its top ranked media offering with hyper-relevant segmentation, authentic (1:1) messaging, and in-depth analytics to drive campaign ROI and brand engagement, among the influential (i)Hispanic. This holistic solution empowers advertisers to more efficiently and effectively drive mind and market share gains across the total Hispanic market. Based in Silicon Valley, CA, Pulpo Media is privately held.

name: IBM UBX
description:
IBM Universal Behavior Exchange (UBX) empowers marketers to transform how they engage with customers through data in context, across channels. UBX connects data and insights from IBM Customer Engagement and Marketing solutions and our growing partner ecosystem to help marketers gain a complete view of customer behaviors across web, mobile, social, CRM, and more throughout the customer journey.

With LiveRamp, IBM UBX allows marketers to send their audience data from IBM platforms such as IBM Marketing Solutions (formerly Unica Campaign) or IBM Marketing Cloud to LiveRamp's own partner destinations, enabling a new suite of use cases for marketers such as retargeting and reactivating customers across paid, owned and earned.

name: Tapstream
description: Tapstream amplifies user acquisition. With our 100% free attribution, Onboarding Links and Word of Mouth product we allow advertisers to identify and acquire great new users for their mobile apps.

name: Mediaglu
description: We are the cross-device map that powers media planning, targeting, and attribution for the digital advertising ecosystem. Mediaglu is the glue that sticks together consumers and their internet connected devices.

name: tapfwd
description: TapFwd is the mobile ad platform built for the unique needs of brands. They connect offline, online, and mobile data to enable marketers to target people instead of devices, and to understand how mobile ads affect non-mobile commerce.

name: Yashi
description: Yashi's mission is to provide targeted measurable location-based video advertising. By utilizing pinpoint location accuracy, Yashi has employed a multi-faceted method to target and optimize campaigns. Our real-time programmatic ad-serving technology streamlines video ad delivery, and maximizes every dollar spent by advertisers.

name: RUN
description:
RUN is a leader in mobile-focused programmatic advertising technology. We empower clients with proprietary cross-screen targeting and audience activation, and are backed by real-time up-to-the-second analytics. RUN's cutting-edge mobile solutions integrate into our full suite of desktop capabilities and analytics products.

Headquartered in New York City, RUN provides its platform, products and services globally.

name: PK4 Media
description: PK4 Media delivers targeted digital display and video advertising across desktop, mobile and tablet devices using its cross-platform technology, premium content video library, data tracking engine and digital distribution network.

name: Adiant
description: Adiant is a digital media technology company whose mission is to deliver the most innovative advertising solutions to quality publishers and advertisers. Our brands such as Adblade and IndustryBrains have been engineered from the ground up to offer both immediate and long-term sustained value with a high level of customer service. For more information visit http://www.adiant.com

name: Eyeview
description:
Eyeview is a video marketing technology company and the industry leader in outcome-based video marketing. Eyeview delivers superior return on investment through 1-to-1 video.

With our proprietary VideoIQ® technology, Eyeview easily leverages brand, product and consumer data to create and deliver 1-to-1 video ads to every consumer and ultimately drive sales. VideoIQ provides an elemental knowledge of video variables that powers a results-driven decisioning engine, capable of making billions of decisions each day, delivering the most relevant message to every consumer across television, desktop, mobile and Facebook.

Headquartered in New York City, with offices in LA, Detroit, Seattle and Chicago, Eyeview serves the nation’s top brands, including P&G, Walgreens, Lowes, Honda, BMW and Priceline. Eyeview was ranked as the second-fastest growing company in the Tri-State Area by Deloitte’s Technology Fast 500™.

name: Flashtalking
description:
Flashtalking is an independent ad serving, measuring and technology company, providing best-in-class digital advertising products, service and support for online advertisers, key media buying and creative agencies.
 
Our products lead the agency ad server market and facilitate the management, delivery and measuring of all forms of digital advertising across desktop, tablet and mobile. Core aspects include: display (including standard ads, dynamic, rich media, video, HTML5 & mobile), search, social and affiliates.
 
Flashtalking serves billions of ad impressions throughout the US, Europe and international markets for media groups including WPP, Publicis, Omnicom and Havas. Regional offices are currently located in London, Leeds, New York, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Chicago and Cologne with further expansion planned for 2014.

name: AdColony (Opera Mediaworks)
description: Opera Mediaworks is the first mobile ad platform built for brands, delivering breakthrough marketing at scale. Our technology powers the biggest publishers in the world, enabling marketers to convey the highest quality ad experiences to more people in more places when it matters most.

name: AgilOne
description: AgilOne is a cloud-based predictive marketing intelligence platform. It is used by brands including Rebecca Minkoff, Donald J. Pliner, The Body Shop, Shazam, Sports Hi Authority, Moosejaw, shopPBS.org, and many others. AgilOne helps marketers connect with the individual in every customer. AgilOne prescribes exactly the right marketing offer, makes each relationship more profitable, and simplifies the science of marketing. Based on a data science approach, AgilOne makes big customer data clean and smart. Then, AgilOne recommends which immediate actions will increase revenue. AgilOne is based in Mountain View, CA and is venture-funded by Sequoia Capital and Mayfield Fund. The company has been featured in well-respected publications and news programs including CNN, NPR's Marketplace, and Internet Retailer magazine. For more information, please visit www.agilone.com.

name: Quantcast
description: Quantcast’s real-time, instantaneous map of web activity allows us to anticipate audience behaviors, tailor ad delivery to the specific journey of each and every consumer, and influence the path to conversion for total precision advertising. Relevance increases throughout the buying and selling process, to supercharge your sales performance.

name: Tealium
description: Tealium helps savvy brands bring order to marketing chaos and engage customers in innovative ways. Using Tealium as the foundation for their digital marketing operations, smart marketers can fuel real-time unified marketing initiatives and drive more profitable customer interactions across all digital touch points. Tealium is the recognized leader in enterprise tag management, and was recently named one of Forbes's Most Promising Companies in America for 2014. Each quarter, Tealium serves 1.2 trillion tags on behalf of its global clients, representing an estimated $75B in annual online transactions.

name: PlaceIQ
description: PlaceIQ’s patented platform analyzes half a trillion diverse data points about location, time, and real-world behavior to more accurately define audiences and activate them with relevant advertising. Our suite of consumer discovery, engagement and activation solutions engage the right consumers and lead them to desired brand actions and destinations at scale.

name: Signal
description: Signal (formerly BrightTag) is a leader in cross channel marketing technology, allowing you to own your marketing data in real time. Signal empowers its clients to collect, connect and take smarter action on cross-channel customer data in real time, from websites and beyond – including mobile, social, email, ads, point-of-sale, CRM, call centers, kiosks and more.

name: Neustar PlatformOne
description: Neustar® PlatformOne is an integrated marketing platform that enables advertisers to deliver precision marketing across all marketing activities. Powered by Neustar’s Authoritative Identity, PlatformOne provides a single, unbiased and accurate view of customers and prospects to deliver superior data onboarding, audience targeting, segmentation, and real-time media measurement and attribution. With PlatformOne, marketers can make informed decisions that improve conversion rates, optimize spend, and ultimately increase sales.

name: 4Cite
description:
Acquiring customers, and to some extent just keeping them engaged, is difficult in today's environment. Rising costs and complexities, coupled with a challenging economy make it difficult to grow your business.
That's where 4Cite can help. We offer an entire platform that enables you to reach your target audience in ways that were previously unavailable or too expensive to implement.  
Just as important, we harness marketing automation techniques that actually lighten your day to day workload.  We free you from many of the tedious tasks of managing contact cadence.  As a result, you can turn your attention to more pressing and big picture items that can further drive your business.

name: Criteo
description: Criteo delivers personalized performance advertising at an extensive scale. Measuring return on post-click sales, Criteo makes ROI transparent and easy to measure. Criteo has over 1,000 employees in 17 offices across the Americas, Europe and Asia-Pacific, serving over 6,000 advertisers worldwide with direct relationships with over 7,000 publishers.

name: NinthDecimal
description: NinthDecimal (formerly JiWire) is the leading mobile audience intelligence platform building the most comprehensive understanding of people by connecting their digital and physical lives. Through a combination of data and proprietary technology, NinthDecimal provides Fortune 500 companies, marquee brands and agencies a unique view of today’s consumer, informing media strategies and enabling optimal brand experiences and campaign ROI across digital. Our audience data is built on one trillion data points from over one billion devices, allowing us to create hundreds of customized audience segments with the scale to drive meaningful business results – enabling marketers to reach individuals at the right time, in the right place, with the right message.

name: Rhythm
description: Rhythm is a leading premium mobile video advertising technology company, focused exclusively on smartphones and tablets. The company connects brand advertisers with highly engaged mobile audiences by selling and serving video, rich media and other immersive advertising formats. The company's core expertise lies in the delivery of impactful brand advertising campaigns against high quality content for targeted, relevant audiences. Rhythm has partnered with more than 50 premium media companies, across a portfolio of 200+ properties. For more information please visit www.rhythmnewmedia.com.

name: Sociomantic
description: Sociomantic Labs empowers advertisers with a real-time and personalized system that delivers increased and transparent performance. Simply put, the company makes display advertising more intelligent. Sociomantic is a market leader in programmatic advertising and helps marketers drive incremental sales and grow Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) using today’s most advanced display advertising techniques, including: real-time retargeting and prospecting, stream-based data management, and dynamic ad personalization. These technologies allow Sociomantic’s clients to reach new and existing customers with individually priced and personalized display ads. Real-time reporting enables clients to see results just milliseconds after they happen. All of these technologies work together to deliver unmatched performance on a global scale, with a dedication to exceptionally high standards of service delivered from 16 offices serving six continents.

name: Centro DSP
description:
Centro DSP is the platform advertisers need to run successful online advertising across every channel. The flexible interface and modern design is ideal for advertisers who think mobile-first but still want access to all channels, formats and device types. What does that mean for you? The freedom to plan, build and optimize highly targeted advertising campaigns in real-time.
Our programmatic advertising solution lets you reach audiences across all their channels, with the transparency and the data to refine and optimize your campaigns. There is no easier way to get started with programmatic advertising—and succeed.

name: Webbula
description: Working with our data on-boarding partner, LiveRamp, Webbula is able to take our offline data and turn it into targetable online audiences. Our data connects you to over 200M offline individuals and their over 400 interest fields.

name: NetSeer
description: NetSeer, the creator of concept targeting, provides ad solutions for advertisers and publishers driven by the company’s patented ConceptGraph intent engine. NetSeer delivers exceptional advertising performance across desktop, mobile, and video inventory backed by its hallmark values of accuracy, relevance, and brand-safety. Leveraging the scale and economics of the programmatic advertising, NetSeer helps advertisers maximize the value of their digital ad budget. For publishers, it provides new content-monetization avenues via related-search and topical links.

name: Netmining
description: Netmining makes it easy for you to leverage vast pools of data and find the right audiences for your advertising messages. Our consultative approach combined with our real-time technology drive maximum reach and performance so you can achieve your marketing objectives.

name: Precision Market Insights from Verizon
description:
Precision Market Insights from Verizon provides brands and agencies with addressable, cross screen advertising solutions and actionable insights based on consumer behavior in mobile. The Precision solutions use the PrecisionID™, an anonymous unique device identifier, which can be used to reach the right audiences through demographic, interest and geographic targeting.
 

Privacy-safe and accurate, the PrecisionID powers impactful, data-driven marketing at scale, enabling brands to:
1.     Accurately reach and engage precise target audiences at scale
2.     Eliminate campaign waste and inefficiencies
3.     Achieve campaign goals and increase ROI
 

By partnering with LiveRamp, the two companies are leveraging the PrecisionID to give advertisers the ability to run “list-matching” campaigns in mobile, and serve mobile ads to an already built CRM list.

name: ShareThis
description: ShareThis is the largest independent source of online, real-time interest and intent data.  ShareThis' social optimization tools are on 3M global publisher sites capturing 18B events per month -- what consumers search for, click on, view, and share.  ShareThis turns this authentic, real-time engagement into actionable audiences with hundreds of pre-optimized vertical and seasonal audiences to target interested consumers at scale, as well as custom segments available upon request.

name: The Mobile Majority
description: The Mobile Majority, a vertically-integrated mobile ad platform, arms brands with a suite of products to execute every stage of a successful advertising campaign, including predictive viewability, real-time media buying, rich media and video capabilities, 1st- and 3rd-party targeting data, and unified reporting across the entire stack.

name: DistroScale
description: DistroScale is a platform + marketplace for buying, delivering, managing & measuring native content across websites, mobile web & apps.

name: Verve
description: Since 2005, Verve has pioneered harnessing real-time mobile location data to help advertisers drive foot traffic in the real world – where 93% of all consumer sales still occur. The Verve programmatic location-based mobile platform empowers advertisers to engage on-the-move consumers with relevant and valuable messages via the most personal of digital devices, their smartphone. Verve analyzes billions of precise location signals generated directly from thousands of opt-in mobile applications. This direct from the source data is unique to Verve and illuminates consumers’ path-to-purchase ensuring advertisers reach the right people at the right time in the right location. Today, Verve continues to lead the space serving more than 15 billion ad impressions per month for hundreds of advertisers.

name: Epsilon
description: Epsilon's data-driven, integrated marketing solutions span a number of online and offline channels including direct mail, email, social media, mobile, web, and display advertising.

name: PushSpring
description: PushSpring provides device level targeting data and insights for verified iOS and Android mobile app audiences.  The PushSpring data management platform provides mobile app marketers and publishers with customizable audience analytics and segmentation tools to drive targeted acquisition, engagement, and monetization.  Using advanced machine learning techniques applied to billions of monthly mobile app and device-level signals, PushSpring data scientists create targeting Personas and custom segments that represent the most accurate, multi-dimensional classification of mobile app audiences available.

name: Adara
description: ADARA is the world’s travel data co-op providing a unique holistic understanding of travel patterns, trends and behavior. It’s a safe and secure way to share and analyze historical and real time data about more than 750 million monthly unique traveler profiles from more than 190+ of the world’s top travel brands. The ADARA data co-op fuels three core business areas: Advertising, Measurement & Analytics and Traveler Intelligence. Together they provide unparalleled access to insights and knowledge allowing travel marketers to increase marketing efficiency, maximize revenues and grow their brands.

name: Facebook
description:
Facebook's mission is to give people the power to share and make the world more open and connected. Over one billion people access Facebook every day to stay connected with friends and family, to discover what's going on in the world, and to make meaningful connections with brands and businesses. Facebook, including Instagram and the Audience Network, deliver personalized marketing at scale. 

LiveRamp's integration with Facebook's Custom Audiences product enables advertisers to target people they already know across Facebook's family of apps and services to deliver more relevant ads to people and measurable business results to advertisers.

name: 4INFO
description: 4INFO’s patented device match method has enabled us to solve the challenge of accurately matching mobile devices to households, unlocking the purchase history of the consumers who use those devices. That allows us to achieve pinpoint targeting, ensuring that you’re serving ads to the best prospects without waste. And since we reach more than 95 percent of all U.S. smartphone users, we also deliver the scale you need to make your sales needle move.

name: Celtra
description: The powerful union of groundbreaking technology and creative innovation.  Celtra enables you to deliver beautiful creatives that optimize in real-time across every screen, allowing you to manage massive campaigns with ease. Celtra’s AdCreator4 platform gives you control of your digital marketing strategy with streamlined ad creation, effective campaign management, and consolidated reporting with common metrics for measuring success.

name: Hipcricket
description: Hipcricket provides a unified mobile engagement platform that drives awareness, sales and loyalty. Its AD LIFE® platform has been used by internationally recognized brands and agencies to power more than 400,000 campaigns across SMS, 2D/QR codes, mobile websites, advertising networks, social media and branded apps.

name: C1 Exchange
description:
C1X is an independent technology leader that helps brands and their agencies find difficult-to-source audiences directly and transparently from leading premium publishers. Its data-driven digital advertising platform facilitates a friction-free marketplace for both publishers and brands with easy to execute direct connections
between buyers and sellers, delivering industry-leading visibility and viewability. 

The C1X Platform offers an Audience Guarantee approach to provide buyers and sellers smooth participation in private marketplaces without having to rely on Deal IDs. The C1X Platform offers access to inventory from more than 2,000 premium sites globally, including a growing list of premium publishers in the U.S.

name: DataSong
description: DataSong provides marketing effectiveness solutions to help omni-channel retailers optimize channel spend, improve customer targeting, and attribute revenue to the right marketing activity. Through SaaS solutions and expert services, DataSong takes the guesswork out of marketing. Our advanced statistical techniques and deep industry expertise equip marketers with the accurate, actionable insights they need to make the best possible decisions.

name: Magnetic
description: Magnetic is a digital technology company specializing in retargeting solutions that combine intent data with display advertising to power brand awareness and direct response campaigns. Magnetic uses billions of search data queries and a proprietary bidder to programmatically buy and reach audiences who have signaled either interest or purchase intent where they spend 96% of their time online – on news sites, blogs, e-commerce sites, and social networks.

name: Opera Mediaworks
description:
Opera Mediaworks is the first mobile ad platform built for brands, delivering breakthrough marketing at scale. Our technology powers the biggest publishers in the world, enabling marketers to convey the highest quality ad experiences to more people in more places when it matters most.

Mobile Theory: Mobile Theory delivers advertising to 130 million consumers worldwide with access to 14 billion ad impressions per month across thousands of mobile apps and sites. According to Comscore, Mobile Theory is the 3rd largest US mobile network.  Between exclusive relationships, proprietary ad delivery solutions and an informed network development strategy, Mobile Theory offers true reach extension when compared to other mobile networks.  Brands want to be associated with other brands. And advertisers need to know where their campaigns are displayed. We deliver on both counts. Only deep publisher relationships enable this level of transparency.

name: AdGear
description: AdGear provides flexible programmatic media technology that powers brands, agencies, publishers and platforms.

name: MarketShare
description: MarketShare helps marketers grow revenue.  Combining advanced analytics technology, scientific leadership and deep domain expertise, MarketShare enables large companies to measure, predict and dramatically improve Marketing’s impact on revenue—typically generating a 20%-30% improvement in marketing effectiveness and 3%-4% revenue increase, yielding a 3x-50x first-year ROI. Widely considered the market leader, MarketShare helps direct tens of billions of marketing investment dollars globally.

name: Eyereturn Marketing
description:
Eyereturn Marketing is a buy side platform that features a tier 1 ad server,

DMP, actionable reporting, optimization as well as a full serve and self service programmatic 

buying platform. Eyereturn's proprietary bidder & algorithms tap into industry leading 

publishers and ad exchanges providing dynamic, real time decision-making for every type of 

ad on every screen. With teams located in four offices across North America, Eyereturn 

Marketing delivers the results that marketers are looking for from their digital media campaigns.

name: amobee-old
description: Amobee is a mobile advertising platform offering end-to-end mobile advertising solutions and services for advertisers and publishers

name: Owner IQ
description: ownerIQ, “The Q" digitally connects retailers and brands through the power of second-party data, providing transparency, scalability, and relevancy within digital marketing. ownerIQ changes the way retailers, brands and e-commerce websites run their digital advertising campaigns, reaching consumers both online and in-store. The Q has the largest and most transparent second-party data cloud available which aggregates over 1 Billion online shopping behaviors of more than 200 million U.S. consumers each month from retailers, product brands and e-commerce sites. Our fully integrated programmatic stack, built specifically for the needs of marketers in the Retail ecosystem, enables our advertisers to leverage our partners’ 1st party data pools to power their e-commerce campaigns, retail initiatives, and prospecting programs. ownerIQ was recently named in the 2015 Ad Age BtoB Best Awards, as CIOReview Magazine’s Top 50 Retail Solutions, Digiday Signal Awards, Boston Business Journal's Hottest Tech Companies to Watch, and Editor's Choice Award from Shopper Marketing Magazine. For more information, visit www.ownerIQ.com.

name: Cardlytics
description: Cardlytics is a marketing and analytics platform that provides businesses, for the first time, with a timely and complete view of consumer purchase behavior. This whole-wallet perspective helps advertisers target millions of customers according to their actual purchase history, run highly relevant campaigns across all digital media, and precisely measure online and in-store results.

name: Spongecell
description: Spongecell is a programmatic creative solution that leverages data-driven technology to automate the production and delivery of high quality ads at scale across display, mobile, and video.

name: Conversion Logic
description: Conversion Logic is the media industry’s most intuitive cross-channel attribution solution, providing brands and media buyers with actionable, timely insights via a powerful, independent and easy-to-use SaaS platform.

name: Rubicon Project

The Company's mission is to automate the buying and selling of advertising by offering innovative products to connect buyers and sellers globally.

name: Compass
description: CompassData: The World's Largest Commercially-available Ground Control Data Set - Complete Global Coverage with 18,000 Ground Control Points available

name: AnalyticsIQ
description: AnalyticsIQ is a dynamic, fast growing marketing data and predictive analytics innovator. We are the first data company to consistently blend cognitive psychology with sophisticated data science to help you understand the who, what and why behind consumers and the decisions they make every day. Our accurate and comprehensive consumer database, PeopleCore, provides access to data attributes you can’t find anywhere else. From demographics and affluence categories to psychological drivers and purchase predictors, marketers rely on our data to fuel personalized experiences across channels. Recognized as one of the “Top 100 Most Promising Big Data Solution Providers”, AnalyticsIQ is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, and employs a team of industry veterans, data scientists and cognitive psychologists with over 100 years of collective analytical experience. Our fast and flexible approach makes it easy to get started using sophisticated data to grow your business. For more information, visit www.analytics-iq.com and follow us on Twitter@AnalyticsIQ and LinkedIn.

name: Dataline
description: Dataline is a Consumer Marketing Information Company that specializes in creating customized statistical models. Dataline also offers an extensive taxonomy of digital audience segments – customization is available based on client and agency needs.

name: Datamyx
description: Datamyx is a leading provider of data-driven marketing solutions serving the financial services, automotive and insurance verticals in the U.S. We offer a unique, multi-sourced repository of over 4,000 data points, including 40+ proprietary insight scores. For 18+ years, direct marketers have benefitted from our powerful combination of audience data, analytics and technology to acquire, convert and grow consumer relationships.

name: MeritDirect
description: MeritDirect is a leading provider of global multi-channel solutions, offering integrated marketing through a wide array of products and services. Multi-channel marketers achieve and maximize superior return through MeritDirect’s Customer Acquisition and Retention, Data and Media Services, Marketing Databases, Strategic Services Group and International Services.

name: Netwise Data
description:
NetWise Data is the leading provider of unbranded B2B data. We track over 40 million professionals and 8 million companies and offer 275 B2B Firmographic, Manufacturing and Installed Technology Segments. In addition, we have 40 "IRS Wealth 360" Consumer Tax Segments based on actual consumer tax returns sourced from the IRS.
 
Sample B2B Firmographics, Manufacturing and Installed Technology Segments:
Demographics: functional area, high net wealth individuals, age, language
Firmographics: company size, company revenue, industry
Manufacturing: products manufactured, certifications, government suppliers
Technologies Installed: cloud technologies, data center, enterprise applications
 
Sample "IRS Wealth 360" Zip4 Consumer Tax Segments: 
·         Richest 10% of the Nation
·         Small Business Credit Card
·         Self-Employed Individuals
·         Likely to Invest In Stocks
·         Top 10% of Charitable Donors
·         Consumers with Medical Expenses

name: Relevate

Relevate’s unique content addresses multiple segments from Retail and CPG to Automotive, Insurance, Financial Services, Telcom- from Travel to Healthcare. Any of our segments can be customized to your brands, and at any time.

name: Acxiom
description: Acxiom is an enterprise data, analytics and software as a service company. We compile insights on known consumers and households to provide the most accurate, comprehensive, up-to-the-minute data available. This enables advertisers to understand, identify and target audience segments, whether the channel used to connect is online, mobile, television, email or direct mail. Our secret sauce is how well we ingest, clean, match, enhance and distribute diverse data sets at scale in a privacy-compliant way.

name: Maxymiser
description: Maxymiser empowers brands to transform every digital interaction into seamless, relevant and engaging customer experiences with its cloud-based testing, personalization and cross-channel optimization solutions. Known for serving billions of individual experiences across every device, Maxymiser leverages customer data to dramatically boost engagement and revenue, while also driving long-term business value.

name: MSN
description: Through our Human Activity Blueprint, Microsoft cultivates rich insights with a deeper understanding of people to empower media, marketing, and advertising professionals to move beyond just impressions and make more meaningful connections with consumers at home, at work, and on the go.

name: Snack
description: Snack is the first demand-side-platform (DSP) focused exclusively on mobile video advertising.  We built our technology from scratch to address the specific challenges of executing mobile video campaigns at scale.  Our unique architecture enables us to monitor 100% of our partners' impression flow, in order to maximize targeting match rates for each client's data.

name: SITO Mobile
description: SITO Mobile is a full service-advertising platform specializing in location-based mobile media. Our unique mobile technologies and solutions allow marketers to identify and target specific key audiences via location, interests, behaviors and loyalty. We have been in the mobile industry for over 12 years and pioneered many of the developments and capabilities in the location, SMS and mobile display space.

name: TiVo Research
description:
TiVo Research is an innovator in TV and cross media audience measurement that provides buyers and sellers with big data solutions for maximizing advertising ROI. We manage a big data environment built using second-by-second TV viewership data from 4.4 million households.  This TV Data Management Platform (DMP) operates at the individual household/user level and is matched to Digital, Mobile, Purchase, and 1st-party (CRM) data sets. 

Our partners and clients can access our data for Targeting in a variety of ways, including through DMPs and media automation environments (DSPs and SSPs), as well as directly through our mTRA portal. We specialize in bridging TV exposure with exposure on other platforms to determine effective cross-media reach and impact on KPIs such as viewership lift, intent lift, and actual product purchase.

name: TruSignal
description: TruSignal, Inc. is an innovative leader in people-based marketing technology for Fortune 500 brands, agencies and platforms. TruSignal uses predictive scoring, powered by artificial intelligence (AI), to make big data actionable for one-to-one addressable marketing. TruSignal delivers incredible results by pinpointing the best people to target at scale and optimizing the bid price for every impression. This is all accomplished through the TruAudience® Platform, which combines a robust deterministic identity graph, a massive third-party data set, an advanced AI engine with multiple machine learning algorithms, extensive people-based, and omnichannel ID matching technology and a robust set of integration APIs that fuels partner platforms with powerful insights, custom lookalike audiences, audience expansions and bid price optimization solutions that are easy to set up, accurate, scalable and fast. This is all accomplished through the TruAudience® Platform, which combines a robust deterministic identity graph, a massive third-party data set, an advanced AI engine with multiple machine learning algorithms, extensive people-based, and omnichannel ID matching technology and a robust set of integration APIs that fuels partner platforms with powerful insights, custom lookalike audiences, audience expansions, and bid price optimization solutions that are easy to set up, accurate, scalable and fast. Founded in 2012, TruSignal’s team brings decades of experience in data-driven marketing, machine learning and actionable Big Data solutions.

name: Yieldmo
description: Yieldmo is saving the world from bad mobile ads. We think ads should look great and work great. We combine the best of design and data to invent new formats, ruthlessly optimize them, and deliver unprecedented results.

name: Minacs
description: Minacs Marketing Solutions is a multi-channel marketing agency uniquely capable of connecting companies and consumers through the seamless fusion of advanced technologies, strategic design principles and unique delivery models.  Formed in 1981, today we provide cloud-based Digital, Telematics, and Direct Marketing solutions for an array of clients, including many of the world’s largest automakers. We’ve partnered with a number of industry leaders to enhance our services, including Google, Bing, Facebook, and Oracle. And, while our global resources enable us to offer unmatched service, it’s our personalized approach to problem-solving that is most appreciated by our clients.

With deep consumer and healthcare professional (HCP) expertise, Crossix delivers hard-to-come-by audience and campaign insights to inform strategic business decisions and ultimately, drive improved patient outcomes. Data-driven and data-proven, Crossix’s HIPAA-compliant methodology and technology make critical connections between Rx, OTC, medical, media, and consumer data to ensure more actionable cross-channel measurement. Crossix leverages its proprietary data network to pinpoint marketing initiatives that activate the right audiences and generate incremental impact. Founded in 2004, Crossix is headquartered in New York City.

name: Roku
description: The Roku platform now natively integrates advertising capabilities that combine the best of both digital and TV advertising. We call it "Roku Audience Solutions". It enables Roku channel partners to deliver more effective advertising to their audience. And, it creates new opportunities for brands to connect with next-generation TV viewers.

The Adform tech stack includes a demand side platform, third party ad server, data management platform, supply side platform, programmatic publisher ad server and a robust creative suite.

name: Analytic Partners

name: Perfect & Complete

ChoiceStream reaches easy-to-describe yet hard-to-find audiences and optimizes engagement and response in real-time.  The combination of innovative technology and personalized service ensures that clients achieve their goals.

Moasis unifies location data management, predictive intelligence, and real time communications delivery technologies into a single closed loop platform so clients can optimize advertising, content, product, and service experiences with real time location intelligence.

The patented cross media approach is better than digital only attribution because it finds the synergies between media channels, and better than transaction-oriented mix modeling because it is customer-centric: Bigger data on individual messages and media placements to deliver on ROI in real time.

The company is headquartered in New York City, with offices in London.

In turn, they can better understand their audiences, serve advertisers and monetize their inventory.

Bombora is a privately funded, profitable, global company based in New York City. 
URL: http://bombora.com/data/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bomboradata or @bomboradata
Linked In: https://www.linkedin.com/company/bomboradata

name: UberMedia

name: Rockerbox

name: Aki Technologies
description: Aki (pronounced ah-key) Technologies, is the first mobile ad platform that is solely focused on truly understanding the consumer’s mindset and the moments when they are most receptive to receiving and engaging in your message.  The goal of Aki is to make mobile marketing more personal and engaging for consumers and eliminate wasted impressions. By Understanding a consumer’s mindset, we can determine when is the right time to serve the right message (creative) to the right audience.

Powered by Reflex, our proprietary platform, MediaBrix understands the user journey in real-time and dynamically targets emotional moments that range from excitement to frustration to create the optimal opportunity for brand engagement. This groundbreaking method of delivery creates user receptivity and brand connections during the moments that matter most: the emotional kind.

The company is headquartered in New York City. For more information visit www.fluentco.com.

name: SessionM
description:
SessionM offers a suite of cloud-based services that enable brands to:

Synthesize Big Data for the speed of mobile
Engage consumers in real-time with personalized experiences
Motivate high value behaviors
Inspire loyalty to maximize lifetime customer value

name: Accordant
description: Accordant Media offers a fully managed solution to making programmatic an integral part of marketing strategy.

name: Reveal Mobile
description: Using opted-in mobile location signals, Reveal Mobile helps app publishers, brands, and agencies find and reach their target audience. By using both GPS and beacon signals to increase accuracy and precision, our location-based audiences outperform standard behavioral targeting. Our privacy compliant approach has earned certification from the Network Advertising Initiative and the EU-US Privacy Shield.

name: Chalk Digital
description: Chalk Digital has built the first of its kind DIY Instant Mobile Ad Platform that lets you create and launch your own mobile ads in just a few minutes. We utilize the GPS found in your smartphone to determine when a device is within your target area and then display your ad within the apps on that device. YOU determine when and where your ad is displayed by selecting your target area by radius, zip code or city. Chalk Digital has access to billions of available mobile ad placements across thousands of mobile apps near you.

PocketMath is the world's largest, 100% self-serve, mobile demand-side platform (DSP) for programmatic mobile.

We make it easy to buy smartphone and tablet ad impressions, within apps, games, and mobile websites - all in real-time. In one platform, you gain immediate access to the world's supply of mobile real-time bidding (RTB) inventory!

name: Instagram

Instagram is a platform for visual inspiration—where people follow their passions and explore the world through images. Over 400 million people access Instagram every month (Facebook Q4 2015 Earnings) to discover new places, new people, new trends and even new products through the power of visually led storytelling. 

LiveRamp's integration with Facebook's Custom Audiences product enables advertisers to target people they already know across Facebook's family of apps and services to deliver more relevant ads to people and measurable business results to advertisers.

name: Audience Network
description:
Since its launch in 2014, Facebook's Audience Network has become one of the largest mobile ad networks in the world. The Audience Network is a collection of third-party apps and mobile websites approved by Facebook to show Facebook Ads—making it easy to extend your ad campaigns into apps and mobile websites that your customers use every day. Your ads reach the right people because it uses the same targeting as your Facebook campaigns. 

LiveRamp's integration with Facebook's Custom Audiences product enables advertisers to target people they already know across Facebook's family of apps and services to deliver more relevant ads to people and measurable business results to advertisers.

name: Aerserv
description:
AerServ is a free mobile SSP and monetization platform that empowers mobile publishers,
supercharges their ad revenue through mobile video ads, and supports them with unrivaled
customer service for a triple win.

name: Jivox
description: Jivox enables the world's top brands to deliver highly personalized digital ad experiences. The company's flagship Jivox IQ™ is the industry’s first digital advertising platform designed to deliver dynamic ads at scale for programmatic media across all formats and screens. With its unique ability to integrate first-party, audience and contextual data, the JivoxIQ platform creates personalized digital ads in real time – customized to the individual – by dynamically generating thousands of creative and messaging variations at scale. Several hundred leading brands and agencies use Jivox, including Bayer, Bose, Condé Nast, 1-800-Flowers.com, Johnson & Johnson, Mindshare, REI, Sony, StarcomMediavest, Time Warner Cable and Universal McCann.

name: iQM Corporation
description: IQM offers a unique mobile audience targeting platform that integrates a wealth of consumer data and an expansive ecosystem. This ensures your mobile marketing is relevant, timely, respectful, and unduplicated.

name: IHS Markit Digital
description: Adhesion combines advanced ad-serving platform technology with hands-on support for executing and optimizing the delivery of highly targeted content and driving performance improvements.

name: ITN Digital
description: We are tomorrow's broadcast television, for a mobile-first world. We connect brand advertisers with desired mobile audiences by selling and distributing premium video advertising formats on smart phones and tablets.

name: Sabio
description: Sabio is a mobile ad platform with unique proprietary App Scan and Geo-Story technology. Their unrivaled wisdom to combine 1st party data with targeting & creative solutions connects brands to audiences where it counts: mobile.

name: BuzzFeed
description: BuzzFeed is a social news and entertainment company. Producing an average of 700+ pieces of content daily, BuzzFeed attracts 200+ million unique monthly visitors and a growing young audience. BuzzFeed works with brands and agencies to craft custom social posts that inspire sharing. Sharing is measured using BuzzFeed's technology built by an in-house data science team. The Social Dashboard captures a program's results in real-time, with the ability to breakdown the performance of individual posts and its sharing metrics. BuzzFeed's social advertising is proven to drive lift in both brand affinity and purchase intent.

name: Adswizz
description: AdsWizz is a leading global technology provider of advertising solutions for the digital radio and audio industries. Its server-side solutions and global audio ad exchange offer advertisers unique targeting capabilities and provide audio publishers powerful new ways to monetize their listenership. This has led AdsWizz to quickly become a go-to resource for many of the world’s most prominent ad networks, agencies, and digital audio publishers.

name: Clickagy
description:
Clickagy is a data intelligence company helping the world's top brands improve their marketing or analytics by analyzing the online behaviors of hundreds of millions of consumers.  Headquartered in Atlanta, GA, Clickagy has developed cutting-edge machine learning to create effective online experiences and guide critical business decisions, built on hundreds of terabytes of unique and high-quality data.  Clickagy's high-performance DSP also employs a proprietary technology called Bid Adjustments to focus on highly effective KPI-driven campaigns, as well as the most transparent drill-down reporting engine in the industry.

Audience Lab, by Clickagy, is a unique data platform which lets marketers custom-build specific audiences based on the raw, granular behaviors they're exhibiting online.  Without requiring the force-fit of segments and taxonomies, Audience Lab gives digital marketers a competitive advantage with surgical, high-precision, custom audiences.  Built with an easy-to-use, drag-and-drop interface, Audience Lab lets you combine multiple keywords to define a visitor's journey, manipulate affinities to control quality vs quantity, exclude false positives, blend in other data sources including offline, and delve into pages or domains using our proprietary NLP (Natural Language Processing) analysis engine.  Fully transparent and empowering brands and agencies to find the perfect audience for the campaigns, Audience Lab is revolutionizing 1st and 3rd party data.

name: Survata
description: Survata is a technology-driven consumer research company serving thousands of client globally. We provide a simple, powerful, end-to-end platform for consumer insights.

name: ASL Marketing
description: For over 40 years, ASL Marketing has been the leading provider of student marketing data, with particular focus on the highly desirable 13-34 year old market. It provides clients with extensive and unparalleled expertise in data aggregation, segmentation and analytics on the youth, young adult and student demographics. With an active database of over 175 million high school, college and young adult consumers and their parents, ASL Marketing creates custom solutions devised to meet precise client targets and goals. ASL Marketing’s clients range across all industries, including Financial Services, Technology, Health & Beauty, Retail, Educational Services, Recruitment, and more. For more information, please visit: www.aslmarketing.com.

name: Pubmatic
description: PubMatic is the automation solutions company for an open digital media industry.

name: 12 Digit Marketing
description:
12 Digit Marketing's Shopper Exchange lets retailers partner with their Vendor Brands to drive incremental sales in their stores through digital advertising across display, mobile, video, and social.   

Each Retailer has their own private Shopper Exchange.  They control who has access and the rules for using their data.  

With large retail partners, and unique access to exclusive shopper data, the Shopper Exchange enables the delivery of highly relevant, targeted advertising and unprecedented scale for Brands.

name: Cxense
description:
Cxense (pronounced “see-sense”) enables the world’s leading media, e-commerce and consumer brands to take control of their audience data to deliver more engaging and personalized user experiences. Businesses using Cxense’s advanced real-time analytics, data management (DMP), advertising, search and personalization technology gain more engaged users, increased digital revenue and higher sales conversions. Cxense is headquartered in Oslo, Norway, with offices worldwide.

Customers include the Wall Street Journal, USA Today (Gannett), Grupo Clarin, El Pais, Bonnier, Naspers, Ebay, The Golf Channel, PGA, NBA, NFL, ABC News, FOX Sports, Singapore Press Holdings, South China Morning Post, AEON, DMM, Rakuten and many more.

name: Salesforce Marketing Cloud
description:
In today’s connected world, every customer interaction matters. Salesforce Marketing Cloud helps you make the most of every touchpoint, giving you the tools to manage the customer journey across all channels. Marketing Cloud lets you plan, personalize, and optimize the customer journey, know your customers better, and measure your results so you can maximize your marketing spend.

Active Audiences from the Salesforce Marketing Cloud enables journey-based advertising by allowing marketers to act on Salesforce’s single view of the customer to run ads across web, social, mobile, apps, and video. Marketers can create highly relevant customer journeys at scale, using advertising orchestrated alongside the rest of their marketing. With Active Audiences and LiveRamp, marketers can orchestrate advertising campaigns throughout the customer journey. LiveRamp extends the reach of Active Audiences by providing integrations with leading marketing applications and media providers.

name: Marketo
description:
Marketo provides the leading engagement marketing software and solutions designed to help marketers develop long-term relationships with their customers - from acquisition to advocacy. Marketo's Audience Hub is a 1st party DMP capable of ingesting data to augment rich customer profiles for personalizing marketing campaigns across email, mobile, Web, social and more. It also provides audience data to traditional DMPs for ad targeting.

Headquartered in San Mateo, CA, with offices around the world, Marketo serves as a strategic partner to large enterprise and fast-growing small companies across a wide variety of industries. To learn more about Marketo's Engagement Marketing Platform, LaunchPoint® partner ecosystem, and the vast community that is the Marketo Marketing Nation®, visit www.marketo.com.

name: Outbrain
description:
Outbrain is the world's largest content discovery platform, helping over half a billion people discover interesting content by powering content recommendations across a network of premium publishers, such as CNN, ESPN, BBC, Time, The Guardian and Le Monde. 

Over 80% of the world's leading brands use Outbrain to get their content discovered by highly engaged audiences. Now LiveRamp clients are able to leverage their 1st party audience segments, and target them with content across the Outbrain publisher network.

name: RevJet
description: With RevJet's Creative Side Platform (CSP), the first comprehensive ad platform for audience-based creative, marketers can double the customers and brand impact generated by their existing ad impressions. Unlike any other platform, the RevJet CSP enables marketers (and their agencies) to effortlessly produce, personalize, serve and optimize unlimited numbers of beautiful brand-safe digital ad creatives of all formats that cause the ad impressions you’re already buying to drive 2x to 4x more customers, revenue and brand impact– effortlessly, with no additional media cost.

name: Bidtellect
description:
Bidtellect’s current technical integration with L;iveRamp enables marketers to push client DMP user data directly to Bidtellect platform for targeting/retargeting purposes.

The Bidtellect Real-time Bidding (RTB) platform is the catalyst that enables agencies, trading desks, brands, direct publishers and supply side platforms (SSPs) to perform better by programmatically aligning each other's needs. Pairing our technology and scale alongside LiveRamp, we are able to layer on real-time decisioning to proprietary native advertising technologies & solutions, further driving client ROI.

name: AdForge
description: AdForge is the next generation Ad Stack for Publishers & Ad Networks.  Built to be the first complete tech platform for the supply side, the AdForge Platform begins with the industry’s first truly Unified Ad Server (UAS) handling both Display (desktop & mobile) and Video (desktop & mobile) and soon mobile In-App.  Deeply integrated with the Ad Server is our Quality Exchange, also handling all modalities, and finally our Unified DSP, which has enables highly targeted ad buying across a multitude of exchanges, PMPs and advertiser dynamically created audience segments

name: BDEX
description: BDEX is the first ever market-driven Data Exchange Platform (DXP) combining all of the functionality, data and reach of traditional DMPs in a true marketplace environment. The BDEX platform enables companies to acquire impartially quality scored 3rd party data to target their audience like never before, generating 4X consumer engagement and 10X ROI for marketers over traditional DMPs across a wide array of verticals. With access to real-time data assets from over 75 BDEX data partners, for the first time ever, marketers can reach consumers at the perfect time, right when they are ready to make a purchase.

name: CrossChannel
description: CrossChannel is a leading programmatic advertising company. CrossChannel’s solutions focus on taking a data driven approach to efficiently targeting the right audience across multiple channels. By leveraging 1st and 3rd party data, leading digital advertisers plan, execute and iterate impactful and measurable campaigns in a variety of ways. From executing conquest and loyalty campaigns to mapping CRM data to mobile and TV audiences, CrossChannel's innovative clients can creatively craft campaigns to reach specific audiences across any channel.

name: Ovative
description: We are a Measurement and Activation agency. Our measurement work focuses on helping companies build the capability of measuring digital marketing’s impact on their online and off line revenues or customer acquisition. Most companies make digital spending decisions based on return generated through their on line channels though we all know customers use digital channels prior to a store visit. We help companies build measurement capabilities; online to offline, attribution, cross device, to enable them to make better spending decisions with their digital media budgets. Typically, our work leads to significant reallocation of spend and drives improved media efficiency. We are very skilled with data, saavy with the martech stack and most importantly bring an experienced, pragmatic eye to operationalizing the results. We activate the insights we gain from this more holistic view through a full service media agency and our mobile/site optimization team or we work directly with our client’s existing agency/internal partners.  Our clients include some of the top brands in retail, healthcare, cpg, brands, and education.

name: Zemanta
description:
Zemanta One is the only cross-channel media buying platform specifically designed for the promotion and distribution of marketing content.
We combine powerful audience insights plus transparent campaign analytics to help you gain a deeper understanding for the content that resonates with your customers.

Our platform is the go-to choice for brands, digital agencies and programmatic teams to maximize the return on their content creation and media investment.

name: Weborama
description:
Weborama is an audience driven advertising platform which adapts perfectly to the new digital advertising ecosystem and translates into an original approach to the transformation of raw data into marketing value.
